TEXT.TITLE: TEXTRON, BOEING GET 102.0 MLN DLR CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: The Bell division of Textron Inc <TXT> and the Boeing Co <BA> have received a 102.0 mln dlr joint contract to continue full scale development of the V-22 Osprey vertical-lift aircraft, the Navy said. reuter
